thread.title: BRIEF-Best Inc. Announces Q4 Revenue Rmb 6.531 Billion

title: BRIEF-Best Inc. Announces Q4 Revenue Rmb 6.531 Billion
text: March 1, 2018 / 11:06 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Best Inc. Announces Q4 Revenue Rmb 6.531 Billion Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Best Inc: * . ANNOUNCES UNAUDITED FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE RMB 6.531 BILLION * EXPRESS PARCEL VOLUME INCREASED BY 67.8% YOY TO 1,270.2 MILLION * REVENUES FOR Q1 OF 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF RMB4.8 BILLION TO RMB5.0 BILLION * QTRLY ‍NET LOSS WAS RMB136.9 MILLION (US$21.0 MILLION), COMPARED TO LOSS OF RMB407.4 MILLION IN SAME PERIOD OF 2016​ * QTRLY NON-GAAP NET LOSS‍​ RMB 116 MILLION VERSUS NET LOSS OF RMB 407 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
